Find available indicator code names or file groups for UN DESA World Population Prospects data

find_indicator.Rd

Find available indicator code names or file groups for UN DESA World Population Prospects data

find_indicator(x, wpp_version = 2022, simple = TRUE)

Arguments

x

Character string on key word or name related to indicator of potential interest.

wpp_version

Integer for WPP version. Default of 2022. All WPP back to 1998 are available.

simple

Logical to give simple table without variant or file group information

Value

A subset of the wpp_indicators data frame with one or more of columns matching the keyword given to x. Use the result in the indicator column to input to the get_wpp() function for downloading data.

Examples

find_indicator("migration")
#> # A tibble: 2 × 3
#>   name          details                file                  
#>   <chr>         <chr>                  <chr>                 
#> 1 NetMigrations Net Number of Migrants Demographic_Indicators
#> 2 CNMR          Net Migration Rate     Demographic_Indicators

find_indicator("sex ratio")
#> # A tibble: 2 × 3
#>   name        details                            file                  
#>   <chr>       <chr>                              <chr>                 
#> 1 PopSexRatio Population Sex Ratio, as of 1 July Demographic_Indicators
#> 2 SRB         Sex Ratio at Birth                 Demographic_Indicators

# show variant information
find_indicator("Deaths", simple = FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 62 × 10
#>    name        details unit  var_id variant   wpp topic file  file0 file_details
#>    <chr>       <chr>   <chr>  <dbl> <chr>   <dbl> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>       
#>  1 NatChange   Natura… thou…     10 Moment…  2022 Popu… Demo… Demo… Demographic…
#>  2 Deaths      Total … thou…     10 Moment…  2022 Mort… Demo… Demo… Demographic…
#>  3 DeathsMale  Male D… thou…     10 Moment…  2022 Mort… Demo… Demo… Demographic…
#>  4 DeathsFema… Female… thou…     10 Moment…  2022 Mort… Demo… Demo… Demographic…
#>  5 InfantDeat… Infant… thou…     10 Moment…  2022 Mort… Demo… Demo… Demographic…
#>  6 Under5Deat… Deaths… thou…     10 Moment…  2022 Mort… Demo… Demo… Demographic…
#>  7 NatChange   Natura… thou…     16 Instan…  2022 Popu… Demo… Demo… Demographic…
#>  8 Deaths      Total … thou…     16 Instan…  2022 Mort… Demo… Demo… Demographic…
#>  9 DeathsMale  Male D… thou…     16 Instan…  2022 Mort… Demo… Demo… Demographic…
#> 10 DeathsFema… Female… thou…     16 Instan…  2022 Mort… Demo… Demo… Demographic…
#> # … with 52 more rows
